snippet: Tom Coughlin’s intensity when it comes to detail goes all the way back to his first head coaching job, at Rochester Institute of Technology.
abstract: New York Giants coach Tom Coughlin's personal intensity and obsession with detail can be traced all the way back to his first head coaching job at Rochester Institute of Technology.
lead_paragraph: Tom Coughlin’s intensity when it comes to detail goes all the way back to his first head coaching job, at Rochester Institute of Technology.

headline.seo: Where Giants’ Coughlin First Became a Stickler for Details
headline.main: Where Coughlin First Laid Down the Law
headline.print_headline: Where Coughlin First Laid Down the Law
